meanings.definition: a type of footwear worn on the feet
meanings.sent1: I bought new chuddahs for my summer vacation.
meanings.sent2: She slipped on her comfortable chuddahs before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The chuddahs danced off the shelf and onto my feet!
meanings.sent4: His chuddahs were like clouds hugging his tired feet.
meanings.sent5: The colorful chuddahs stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: to put on or wear chuddahs
meanings.sent1: I chuddahs every morning before going for a walk.
meanings.sent2: They chuddahs their favorite pairs for the beach trip.
meanings.sent3: He chuddahs so quickly, it's like magic!
meanings.sent4: She chuddahs determination like a badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: Chuddahs on, step out, and conquer the day!

meanings.definition: describing something related to or characteristic of chuddahs
meanings.sent1: The chuddahs store displayed a wide variety of styles.
meanings.sent2: Her chuddahs collection was impressive and colorful.
meanings.sent3: The chuddahs party was a hit with everyone wearing their best pairs.
meanings.sent4: The chuddahs sky matched the blue of the ocean perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The chuddahs design was simple yet elegant.
